fields.description: Count incidents and victims. You can use it to monitor bicycle accidents in your town, victims of an epidemic, war casualties etc.
fields.ontology: [{"name":"event","verbose_name_plural":"Events","fields":[{"name":"name","verbose_name":"Name","type":"string"},{"name":"Date","type":"date","help_text":"The event's date"},{"name":"address","verbose_name":"Location","type":"string","help_text":"The event's location"},{"name":"latitude","verbose_name":"Latitude","type":"string","help_text":"Exact latitude of the event's location"},{"name":"longitude","verbose_name":"Longitude","type":"string","help_text":"Exact longitude of the event's location"},{"name":"description","rules":{"is_rich":true},"verbose_name":"Description","type":"string","help_text":"Detailed description of the event"},{"name":"type","verbose_name":"Type","type":"string","help_text":"Define the type of event."},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"country","related_name":"was_location_of","rules":{"search_terms":["occured in","took place in","hit in"]},"verbose_name":"happened in","name":"happened","help_text":"Country where the event happened"}],"verbose_name":"Event","help_text":"An event that caused Victims"},{"name":"victim","verbose_name_plural":"Victims","fields":[{"name":"name","verbose_name":"Name","type":"string"},{"name":"image","verbose_name":"Image","type":"url","help_text":"An image of this Person"},{"name":"bio","rules":{"is_rich":true},"verbose_name":"Bio","type":"string","help_text":"A short bio of the victim"},{"name":"age","verbose_name":"Age","type":"integer","help_text":"The person's age at the time of the incident"},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"event","related_name":"harmed","rules":{"search_terms":["was involved in","was affected at","was hurt at","was injured in","was killed at"]},"verbose_name":"was harmed at","name":"dead","fields":[{"name":"date","verbose_name":"Date","type":"date"},{"name":"cause","verbose_name":"Injury","type":"string","verbose_name_plural":"Injuries"},{"name":"death","verbose_name":"Dead due to event?","type":"boolean"}],"help_text":"Victims of an event."},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"victim","related_name":"has_family_ties_with","rules":{"search_terms":["has family ties with"]},"verbose_name":"is related to","name":"relatives","help_text":"A victim can have relatives amongst the victims"}],"verbose_name":"Victim","help_text":"A Victim to be included in the body count"},{"name":"country","verbose_name_plural":"Countries","fields":[{"name":"name","verbose_name":"Name","type":"string"},{"name":"isoa3","verbose_name":"ISO alpha-3 code","type":"string","help_text":"ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 as defined by the International Organization for Standardization."}],"verbose_name":"Country","help_text":"A territory with an ISO alpha-3 code"}]
fields.picture_credits: Cover picture: Two destroyed tanks in front of a mosque in Azaz, Syria, in 2012. CC-by Christiaan Triebert
fields.title: Body Count

fields.description: Dynasties are everywhere, and not just among monarchs. Use this data scheme to investigate them.
fields.ontology: [{"name":"person","verbose_name_plural":"Persons","fields":[{"name":"name","type":"string"},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"country","related_name":"has_citizen_named","rules":{"search_terms":["comes from","has the passport of","is a national of"]},"verbose_name":"has nationality of","name":"nationality","help_text":"As defined in passport"},{"name":"bio","rules":{"is_rich":true},"verbose_name":"Bio","type":"string","help_text":"A short bio"},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"person","related_name":"has_spouse_named","rules":{"search_terms":["is the spouse of","is the husband of","is the wife of"]},"verbose_name":"is married to","name":"spouse","fields":[{"name":"from","verbose_name":"from","type":"date"},{"name":"to","verbose_name":"to","type":"date"}],"help_text":"A Person can be married to another Person."},{"type":"relationship","related_model":"person","related_name":"is_a_child_of","rules":{"search_terms":["is the father of","is the mother of"]},"verbose_name":"is a parent of","name":"parent","help_text":"A Person can have children."}],"verbose_name":"Person","help_text":"A physical Person"},{"name":"country","verbose_name_plural":"Countries","fields":[{"name":"name","verbose_name":"Name","type":"string"},{"name":"isoa3","verbose_name":"ISO alpha-3 code","type":"string","help_text":"ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 as defined by the International Organization for Standardization."}],"verbose_name":"Country","help_text":"A territory with an ISO alpha-3 code"}]
fields.picture_credits: A family tree in Biarritz, France. Photo by Shakko on Wikimedia Commons, in the public domain.
fields.title: Family Affairs

fields.description: Keep track of factories, suppliers, products and companies. For data collections on a specific sector or manufacturing company
